node.data: {"Home":"Gida","View All Services":"Dubawa Duk Manhajiyar Hutu.","Innovating African businesses":"Ƙirƙirar kasuwancin Afirka","We are a Software Development Company, primarily focused on Frontend Web Development.":"Mu Kamfanin Haɓaka Software ne, wanda aka fi mai da hankali kan Ci gaban Yanar Gizo na Frontend.","Phone 1":"Waya 1","Phone 2":"Waya 2","Email":"Imel","Contact":"Tuntuɓar","About":"Game da","Pricing":"Farashi","Team":"Tawaga","Services":"Ayyuka","Who we are":"Me ya sa mu","Pricing built for businesses of all sizes":"An gina farashin don kasuwanci na kowane girma","Our team of Engineers":"Tawagar Injiniyoyinmu","ABOUT":"GAME DA","PRICING":"PRICING","TEAM":"KUNGIYAR","Our Services":"Ayyukanmu","Artificial Intelligence":"Sirrin Artificial","Data Science":"Kimiyyar Bayanai","Machine Learning":"Koyon Injin","Mobile Development":"Ci gaban Wayar hannu","Web Design/Development":"Tsarin Yanar Gizo / Ci gaba","Our AI Team focuses on writing algorithms and leveraging on existing one to maximise human efficiency in business and home at large":"Teamungiyarmu ta AI tana mai da hankali kan rubuta algorithms da yin amfani da na yanzu don haɓaka haɓakar ɗan adam a cikin kasuwanci da gida gabaɗaya.","Our team of engineers deeply explore data and ways to record, store and analyze data to extract useful information and our end goal is to gain insights and knowledge from any type of data both structured and unstructured":"Teamungiyar injiniyoyinmu suna zurfafa bincika bayanai da hanyoyin yin rikodi, adanawa da bincika bayanai don fitar da bayanai masu amfani kuma ƙarshen burinmu shine samun fahimta da ilimi daga kowane nau'in bayanan da aka tsara da kuma waɗanda ba a tsara su ba.","Here at Team ML we focus on making use of AI algorithms by providing sytems the ability to automatically learn and in improve from experience without being explicitly programmed, we also focus on the development of computer programs that can access data and use it to learn for themselves":"Anan a Team ML muna mai da hankali kan yin amfani da algorithms AI ta hanyar samar da tsarin ikon koyo ta atomatik da haɓakawa daga gogewa ba tare da tsara shirye-shirye ba, muna kuma mai da hankali kan haɓaka shirye-shiryen kwamfuta waɗanda za su iya samun damar bayanai da amfani da su don koyan kansu.","For mobile development we utilise (React Native) which is a Mobile App Development Framework that enables the development of multi-platform Android and iOS apps using native UI elements":"Don ci gaban wayar hannu muna amfani da (React Native) wanda shine Tsarin Ci gaban App na Wayar hannu wanda ke ba da damar haɓaka aikace-aikacen Android da iOS masu yawa ta amfani da abubuwan UI na asali.","We create websites and web apps of high quality that are highly responsive and user friendly using one of the best and fastest mobile technologies, React Native MERN stack(MongoDB, Express, React and Node), Gatsby and Vite which is utilised in most upcoming industries":"Muna ƙirƙirar gidajen yanar gizo da ƙa'idodin yanar gizo masu inganci waɗanda ke da saurin amsawa da abokantakar mai amfani ta amfani da ɗayan mafi kyawun fasahar wayar hannu, React Native MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React da Node), Gatsby da Vite waɗanda ake amfani da su a yawancin masana'antu masu zuwa.","Your vision is built with":"An gina hangen nesa da ku","GATSBY":"GATSBY","Gatsby.js, a popular open-source framework for building modern web applications. Gatsby.js is based on React and uses GraphQL to pull data from various sources to generate static websites":"Gatsby.js, sanannen tsarin buɗaɗɗen tushe don gina aikace-aikacen gidan yanar gizo na zamani. ","NEST":"NEST","NestJS is a framework for building scalable and efficient server-side applications. It is often used to develop web applications, APIs, and microservices using TypeScript or JavaScript. NestJS is built with a modular and extensible architecture and draws inspiration from Angular, which makes it familiar to developers who have experience with Angular":"NestJS wani tsari ne don gina ƙaƙƙarfan aikace-aikacen gefen uwar garke. ","VITE":"VITE","Vite is a build tool and development server that is designed to optimize the development experience for modern web applications, particularly those using frameworks like React, Vue, and others. Vite is known for its fast startup time and efficient development workflow.":"Vite kayan aikin gini ne da uwar garken ci gaba wanda aka tsara don haɓaka ƙwarewar haɓaka don aikace-aikacen yanar gizo na zamani, musamman waɗanda ke amfani da tsarin kamar React, Vue, da sauransu. ","REACT":"MATSAYI","React, also known as React.js or ReactJS, is an open-source JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components. It was developed by Facebook and is widely used for creating interactive and dynamic user interfaces in web applications. React allows developers to build reusable UI components, making it easier to manage and update complex user interfaces.":"React, wanda kuma aka sani da React.js ko ReactJS, babban ɗakin karatu ne na JavaScript don gina mu'amalar mai amfani ko abubuwan UI. ","REACT NATIVE":"AMSA DAN UWA","React Native is an open-source framework developed by Facebook that allows developers to build mobile applications using JavaScript and React. With React Native, you can create cross-platform mobile apps that run on both iOS and Android platforms while sharing a significant portion of the codebase. This enables developers to use their web development skills to build native mobile applications.":"React Native wani tsarin buɗaɗɗen tushe ne wanda Facebook ya haɓaka wanda ke ba masu haɓaka damar gina aikace-aikacen hannu ta amfani da JavaScript da React. ","JAVASCRIPT":"JAVASCRIPT","JavaScript is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language primarily known for its role in web development. It is commonly used to add interactivity, dynamic content, and behavior to websites. JavaScript is one of the core technologies of the World Wide Web, alongside HTML and CSS.":"JavaScript babban mataki ne, mai jujjuyawar harshe, da fassarar yaren shirye-shirye da aka fi sani da rawar da yake takawa wajen ci gaban yanar gizo. ","HTML 5":"HTML 5","HTML5, the fifth and latest version of the Hypertext Markup Language, is a standard markup language for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. HTML5 was officially released as a W3C Recommendation in October 2014, and it brings several new features and improvements over its predecessor, HTML4.":"HTML5, sigar ta biyar kuma ta ƙarshe ta Harshen Haɗaɗɗen Haɗaɗɗen Haɗaɗɗiya, daidaitaccen harshe ne mai ƙima don tsarawa da gabatar da abun ciki akan Yanar gizo ta Duniya. ","CSS 3":"CSS 3","CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is a style sheet language used for describing the look and formatting of a document written in HTML or XML. CSS3 is the latest version of CSS, bringing new features, enhancements, and capabilities to the language. CSS3 builds upon the foundation of CSS2 and introduces several advanced styling options and techniques. ":"CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) wani salon zane ne da ake amfani da shi don kwatanta kamanni da tsara takaddun da aka rubuta cikin HTML ko XML.  ","GRAPHQL":"GRAPHQL","GraphQL is a query language and runtime for APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) that was developed by Facebook. It provides a more efficient, powerful, and flexible alternative to traditional REST APIs. GraphQL allows clients to request only the data they need and receive a predictable, structured response, making it well-suited for building modern web and mobile applications":"GraphQL harshe ne na tambaya da lokacin aiki don APIs (Application Programming Interfaces) wanda Facebook ya haɓaka. ","SASS":"SASS","Sass, which stands for Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, is a preprocessor scripting language that is interpreted or compiled into Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). SassScript is the scripting language itself. It provides mechanisms such as variables, nested rules, and mixins, making CSS more maintainable and easier to write.":"Sass, wanda ke tsaye ga Syntactically Awesome Stylesheets, harshe ne na rubutun da aka riga aka yi wanda aka fassara ko aka haɗa shi cikin Cascading Style Sheets (CSS). ","R":"R","R is a programming language and free software environment specifically designed for statistical computing and graphics. It is widely used by statisticians, data scientists, researchers, and analysts for tasks such as data analysis, statistical modeling, visualization, and machine learning. R provides a comprehensive set of tools for working with data, and it has a large and active community that contributes to its packages and ecosystem.":"R harshe ne na shirye-shirye da muhallin software na kyauta wanda aka tsara musamman don ƙididdigar ƙididdiga da zane-zane. ","PYTHON":"PYTHON","Python is a high-level, versatile, and interpreted programming language known for its readability and ease of use. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python has become one of the most popular programming languages, used in various domains such as web development, data science, artificial intelligence, scientific computing, automation, and more.":"Python babban matakin harshe ne, mai juzu'i, kuma fassarar shirye-shirye wanda aka sani don iya karantawa da sauƙin amfani. ","MONGO DB":"MONGO DB","MongoDB is a cross-platform, document-oriented NoSQL (Not Only SQL) database program. It falls under the category of NoSQL databases because it does not use the traditional relational database management system (RDBMS) structure. Instead, MongoDB stores data in flexible, JSON-like documents known as BSON (Binary JSON) that can vary in structure, allowing for a dynamic and scalable approach to data storage.":"MongoDB tsari ne na giciye, shirin bayanai na NoSQL (Ba kawai SQL ba) mai daftarin aiki. ","NODE JS":"NODE JS","Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment that allows developers to execute server-side JavaScript code. It is built on the V8 JavaScript runtime engine, which is the same engine that powers the Google Chrome browser. Node.js enables the development of scalable and high-performance web applications by using an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model.":"Node.js buɗaɗɗen tushe ne, mahalli na lokaci-lokaci na JavaScript na dandamali wanda ke ba masu haɓaka damar aiwatar da lambar JavaScript ta gefen uwar garken. ","ANGULAR":"ANGULAR","Angular is a popular open-source web application framework developed and maintained by Google. It is written in TypeScript and allows developers to build dynamic, single-page web applications (SPAs) with a focus on creating a modular and maintainable codebase. Angular provides a comprehensive set of features for building modern, client-side web applications.":"Angular sanannen tsarin aikace-aikacen gidan yanar gizo ne na buɗaɗɗen tushe wanda Google ya haɓaka kuma yana kiyaye shi. ","NPM":"NPM","NPM stands for Node Package Manager, and it is the default package manager for Node.js, a JavaScript runtime environment. NPM is used to manage and distribute packages (libraries and tools) written in JavaScript and intended for use with Node.js.":"NPM tana nufin Manajan Fakitin Node, kuma shine tsoho mai sarrafa fakiti na Node.js, yanayin lokacin aiki na JavaScript. ","GITHUB":"GITHUB","GitHub is a web-based platform that provides a centralized repository hosting service for version control using Git. It is widely used by developers and teams to collaboratively work on software projects, track changes, and manage code repositories. GitHub offers a range of features to support collaboration, code review, issue tracking, and continuous integration.":"GitHub dandamali ne na tushen gidan yanar gizo wanda ke ba da sabis na tallan tallace-tallace na tsakiya don sarrafa sigar ta amfani da Git. ","FIGMA":"FIGMA","Figma is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that enables collaborative interface design and user experience (UI/UX) prototyping. It is commonly used by designers, developers, and teams to create, share, and iterate on designs in real-time. Figma's key feature is its cloud-based platform, which allows multiple users to collaborate on design projects simultaneously, fostering a seamless and efficient design process.":"Figma shine ƙirar tushen girgije da kayan aikin samfuri wanda ke ba da damar ƙirar haɗin gwiwar haɗin gwiwa da ƙwarewar mai amfani (UI/UX). ","ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR":"ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR","Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Inc. It is part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite of design software, which also includes applications like Photoshop, InDesign, and Premiere Pro. Illustrator is widely used by graphic designers, illustrators, and artists to create scalable vector graphics for print and digital media.":"Adobe Illustrator shine editan zane-zane na vector wanda Adobe Inc ya haɓaka kuma ya tallata shi. Yana daga cikin Adobe Creative Cloud suite na ƙirar software, wanda kuma ya haɗa da aikace-aikace kamar Photoshop, InDesign, da Premiere Pro. ","ADOBE PHOTOSHOP":"ADOBE PHOTOSHOP","Adobe Photoshop is a powerful raster graphics editor developed and published by Adobe Inc. It is widely used by designers, photographers, and artists for image editing, retouching, digital painting, and graphic design. Photoshop is a part of the Adobe Creative Cloud suite and is known for its extensive range of features and capabilities.":"Adobe Photoshop babban editan zanen raster ne wanda Adobe Inc ya haɓaka kuma ya buga shi. Masu zanen kaya, masu ɗaukar hoto, da masu fasaha suna amfani da shi sosai don gyaran hoto, sake gyarawa, zanen dijital, da ƙirar hoto. ","LINUX":"LINUX","Linux is an open-source, Unix-like operating system kernel that serves as the foundation for a variety of free and open-source operating systems. It was created by Linus Torvalds in 1991 as a hobby project, and it quickly became a popular choice for operating systems due to its stability, security, and flexibility. Linux is known for its use in servers, embedded systems, and as an alternative operating system for personal computers.":"Linux buɗaɗɗen tushe ne, kernel mai kama da Unix wanda ke aiki a matsayin tushe don nau'ikan tsarin aiki na kyauta da buɗewa. ","SUBLIME IDE":"SUBLIME IDE","'Sublime Text is a sophisticated and widely used text editor, not an Integrated Development Environment (IDE). It is known for its speed, simplicity, and extensive plugin ecosystem. While Sublime Text provides many features commonly associated with IDEs, it lacks certain integrated tools specific to particular programming languages.":"'Maɗaukakin Rubutu nagartaccen editan rubutu ne da ake amfani da shi sosai, ba Integrated Development Environment (IDE). ","NETLIFY":"NETLIFY","Netlify is a cloud platform that provides a range of services for building, deploying, and managing modern web projects. It is particularly known for its simplicity, automation, and integration with popular static site generators and modern web development workflows. Netlify supports both static and serverless (function-as-a-service) architectures, making it a popular choice for web developers and teams.":"Netlify dandamali ne na girgije wanda ke ba da sabis da yawa don gini, turawa, da sarrafa ayyukan gidan yanar gizo na zamani. ","TABLEAU":"TABLEAU","Tableau is a powerful data visualization and business intelligence (BI) platform that enables users to connect to, visualize, and share insights from their data. It allows individuals and organizations to create interactive and dynamic dashboards, reports, and visualizations to gain valuable insights into their data.":"Tableau wani dandamali ne mai ƙarfi na hangen nesa da bayanan kasuwanci (BI) wanda ke bawa masu amfani damar haɗawa, gani, da raba bayanai daga bayanansu. ","VS CODE":"VS CODE","Visual Studio Code (VS Code) is a free and open-source source code editor developed by Microsoft. It is lightweight, highly customizable, and supports a wide range of programming languages and extensions. VS Code is designed to provide developers with a productive environment for coding, debugging, and version control, making it one of the most popular code editors in the developer community.":"Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin Kayayyakin (VS Code) kyauta ne kuma buɗaɗɗen tushe editan lambar tushe wanda Microsoft ya haɓaka. ","RAPID MINER":"MAGANIN MA'ASAR RAPID","RapidMiner is a data science platform that provides an integrated environment for end-to-end data science and machine learning processes. It allows users to perform tasks such as data preparation, machine learning modeling, and deployment of predictive models. RapidMiner is designed to be user-friendly, making it accessible to a wide range of users, including data scientists, analysts, and business professionals.":"RapidMiner dandamali ne na kimiyyar bayanai wanda ke ba da haɗe-haɗen yanayi don ƙarshen-zuwa-ƙarshen kimiyyar bayanai da hanyoyin koyon injin. ","Our Features":"Siffofinmu","Website Maintenance":"Kulawar Yanar Gizo","Web Design, Web Development, Mobile App Design and Mobile App Development":"Zane-zanen Yanar Gizo, Ci gaban Yanar Gizo, Zane-zanen App na Waya da Ci gaban App na Waya","AI, ML and Data Science Consultation":"AI, ML da Bayanan Kimiyyar Kimiyya","We ensure the websites of our clients' is well maintained as we stay in touch with them":"Mun tabbatar da cewa gidajen yanar gizon abokan cinikinmu suna da kyau yayin da muke hulɗa da su","We design and develop with cutting edge technologies":"Muna tsarawa da haɓakawa tare da fasahar yankan","We provide Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Data Science consultations":"Muna ba da Hankali na Artificial, Koyan Injin da tuntuɓar Kimiyyar Bayanai","Price comparison Table":"Teburin kwatanta farashin","Pricing Built For Businesses Of All Sizes":"Farashi Gina Don Kasuwanci Na Duk Girma","Before building a website for your business, it is important to know the costs involved. This will ensure you budget adequately for the project. Some business owners think building a website is a one-off thing. You just build it and you go to sleep. However, there are fixed costs and recurrent costs involved in building a business website":"Kafin gina gidan yanar gizo don kasuwancin ku, yana da mahimmanci ku san farashin da abin ya shafa. ","Features":"Siffofin","Basic Plan (Suitable for Budget Applications) - ₦500,000+":"Babban Tsari (Dace da Aikace-aikacen Kasafin Kudi) - ₦ 500,000","Pro Plan (Suitable for Medium to Enterprise Applications) - ₦1million+":"Pro Plan (Ya dace da Matsakaici zuwa Aikace-aikacen Kasuwanci) - ₦1million","Integration of Social Media":"Haɗin kai na Social Media","SSL/TLS Certificate":"Takaddun shaida na SSL/TLS","Hosting Fee":"Kudin Hosting","CMS (Content Management System)":"CMS (Tsarin Gudanar da Abun ciki)","Custom Domain Registration":"Rijistar Domain Custom","Form Submission":"Gabatarwar Form","24/7 Support":"24/7 Taimako","Online Appointments and Reminders (Business Working hours)":"Alƙawarin Kan layi da Tunatarwa (Sa'o'in Aiki na Kasuwanci)","Mon-Fri":"Litinin-Juma'a","Mon-Sun":"Litinin-Sun","Ecommerce Functionality":"Ayyukan Ecommerce","Database Integration":"Haɗin Database","Guidance and Analytics":"Jagora da Bincike","Search Engine Optimization (SEO)":"Inganta Injin Bincike (SEO)","Price Range":"Rage Farashin","₦500,000+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦ 500,000 ban da farashi mai-maituwa (Lura: Farashin yana ƙarƙashin sarƙar aikin da yanayin kasuwa)","₦1million+ in addition to recurrent costs (Note: Prices are subject to the complexity of the project and nature of the market)":"₦1million ban da farashin da ake ci gaba da yi (Lura: Farashin yana ƙarƙashin sarƙar aikin da yanayin kasuwa)","Try Basic Plan":"Gwada Basic Plan","Try Pro Plan":"Gwada Pro Plan","OVER 4 YEARS IN THE FIELD":"SAMA DA SHEKARU 4 A FILIN","About Us":"Game da Mu","Mission":"Manufar","Vision":"hangen nesa","Welcome to Forkhive Limited, your number one source for Data Science, Machine Learning Artificial Intelligence and Web/Mobile services.":"Barka da zuwa Forkhive Limited, tushen ku na farko don Kimiyyar Bayanai, Koyon Injin Ƙwarewar Artificial da sabis na Yanar Gizo/Wayar hannu.","To drive innovation and technology that would stimulate the growth of African businesses.":"Don fitar da kirkire-kirkire da fasaha da za su kara habaka kasuwancin Afirka.","We see a continent where innovation and technology are the driving force of business success.":"Muna ganin wata nahiya da ke yin kirkire-kirkire da fasaha ke haifar da nasarar kasuwanci.","Founder and CEO":"Wanda ya kafa kuma Shugaba","Senior Frontend Software Engineer (React-TS, JS)":"Babban Injiniyan Software na Frontend (React-TS, JS)","Benjamin Effiong is the Founder and CEO of Forkhive. He also has a sound knowledge of the tech industry and its business operation":"Benjamin Effiong shine wanda ya kafa kuma Shugaba na Forkhive. ","Senior Technical Advisor":"Babban Mashawarcin Fasaha","Software Engineer (MERN Stack)":"Injiniyan Software (MERN Stack)","Leslie is a Software Engineer":"Leslie Injiniya ce ta Software","Micheal is a Senior Fullstack Software Engineer (MERN, GraphQL).":"Micheal Babban Injiniyan Software ne na Cikakken Stack (MERN, GraphQL).","Senior Backend Software Engineer (Node-TS, JS)":"Babban Injiniyan Software na Baya (Node-TS, JS)","Patrick is a Senior Backend Developer.":"Patrick Babban Babban Mai Haɓakawa ne.","Your request":"Bukatar ku","Create a product":"Ƙirƙiri samfur","Enhance your team":"Haɓaka ƙungiyar ku","Training":"Horowa","Full name":"Cikakken suna","Phone number":"Lambar tarho","Attach a file (CV) Not mandatory":"Haɗa fayil (CV) Ba dole ba ne","For the Training (Only for those undergoing the training)":"Don Horon (Ga waɗanda ke fuskantar horon kawai)","Basic Web Design":"Tsarin Yanar Gizo na asali","Basic UX Design":"Tsarin UX na asali","HTML and CSS":"HTML da CSS","JavaScript (React)":"JavaScript (React)","Azure ML":"Azure ML","Python":"Python","Message (Brief description of your needs)":"Saƙo (Taƙaitaccen bayanin bukatun ku)","Or send us an email to":"Ko aiko mana da imel","Business Hours":"Sa'o'in Kasuwanci","Monday":"Litinin","Tuesday":"Talata","Wednesday":"Laraba","Thursday":"Alhamis","Friday":"Juma'a","Saturday":"Asabar","9:00am - 5:00pm":"9:00 na safe - 5:00 na yamma","12:00pm - 5:00pm":"12:00pm - 5:00pm","All rights reserved":"An kiyaye duk haƙƙoƙi"}
